I understand what Im faced with and I dont know, at this point in my life, Im like looking at what should I do? So its interesting.

Im convinced. Now, bear in mind here, that as my mother was dying and I was helping her, thats the only reason I know this, because I stopped working to help her. And you know what she did as an 88 year old woman? She asked me to check it out because she was concerned about his politics. So while I was helping her, I studied what Joe Biden was up to.

And website development and database systems beat everything else out. I think it would be interesting to get into discussions with people that know what theyre talking about. I dont want to spend the rest of my life doing nonsense. Its like, you know, its its like Im Im actually I won the 1969 Marquette University Science Fair when I was in 8th grade, which you had no way of knowing, but I won first place in the junior division, and I did it by building a perpetual motion machine using electromagnets. And what I did to win I think you might find this fascinating I titled my apparatus as a perpetual motion machine, but it really was running off of a power supply. So what I did is I actually kind of made the people that were judging the fair open up their minds to possibilities. And yet my project itself was not actually perpetual motion, but the ideas that I covered in the project discussion were all dancing around, how would you make that happen? And I won first place, and I also won the Education Award as the prize. They gave me a brand new set of World Book Encyclopedia. And that was 1969. My family was very interesting. My father was a brilliant guy, and he was supposed to go into the Korean War, and he was actually a master sergeant in the Air Force. And he was getting on a plane to go to Korea, and a lieutenant came up to him, pulled him off of the plane and redirected him to Alaska. And the reason that the guy did that was the Russians were talking about invading the United States through Alaska. You may not know anything about this history, but my father was sent to Alaska. And thats part of my history is the things that he trained me on. And winning that 1969 fair was really because my father pointed me in a direction. This is like, really interesting stuff to me. Artificial intelligence is the future, but its also a very dangerous set of possibilities. People like Elon Musk are saying its very dangerous.
Yes.

Okay. There is a guy right now who is running for the President of the United States. Okay. And Ive been studying him. Hes won several first place awards at engineering and physics topics, and now hes running for the President of the United States. So you may see him in some of the election stuff, and I think hes the only one that I currently believe is really on track with whats really happening in the scientific world right now. Im sitting here thinking about him, but I cant remember his stupid name. Hes from India, but I could just stop talking to you and look him up. Its no big deal. But the idea is, I now understand that the elections were fraudulent since starting in 1996, and then Donald Trump was able to get in to be president, and then he was overturned by corruption to bring Joe Biden in. I dont know if you know anything about Joe Biden, but he ran for the presidency back in the he lost because of his corruption back then. The guy is like a complete historical moron. And then they tell us that he won the election. He didnt win, he couldnt win. Hes a moron. So it was all corruption that he got in. So you see, in my own personal views, I believe that keeping people on a healthy living structure, you would think that medical science is the correct way to learn things. However, all of a sudden, we had to go through the COVID-19 bullshit that was all garbage made up for political reasons, which Ive studied enormous amounts. This may even shock you. I now firmly believe that the entire medical establishment keep in mind, I worked with the medical establishment my whole life because my father was paraplegic and drew me into it. I now believe that medical doctors and the medical industry is, like, full of shit. I dont even want to talk to a doctor. I have no medical issues. And what I do is I study the science and fix it myself. So thats my mindset in healthy living. And if you study medicine, like I have for many, many years, you see that they have been corrupting. Like, lets say, the food supply. Keep in mind, I worked for 16 years at Carrie Ingredients making food in that company. The food supply in America has been manipulated in a very strange set of ways. And so what I do is I grow my own garden and I study what do I need to survive things. And what they did with the COVID-19 was they started having people put stuff in their bodies through shops that were developed to hurt people. Now, why would they do that? See, I lived by helping my father in the medical industry all his life. He was trying to improve his situation. So I had a super high level of belief that doctors were good people. I havent visited a doctor in, like, 20 years because I am now convinced they are. Like, enormous amounts of doctors are just out for themselves and dont care about people. My mindset is, like, pretty wide, and it may be even shocking to you to hear me even talk. And Im being honest. I wish that this didnt happen. And remember, my mother died recently. But in the last three years of her life, she asked me to investigate if what the doctors were talking about concerning the COVID-19 junk. She wanted to know if it was true. And sadly, I had to go back to her and say I discovered that its corruption. And that was the best thing she did at the end of her life. She actually forced me to investigate the legitimacy of the medical industry because I believe, because of my dealings with my father, that the medical industry must be good. And it actually was very damaging to myself that I now understand that they are not operating in an honest fact finding method. Theyre actually manipulating scientific information to make money. This shocks me. I always thought in America that we were doing things to help. And in my industries, we were. I was a software developer for production warehouses. But guess what? Theres a whole lot of people that werent doing that. They werent being honest.
Right.

In 1996, the government of the United States was corrupted, and it took time before finally, I think its been taken over. Now, I was unaware that this happened back in 1996. So one of the things, as an older gentleman, Im thinking, what can I do to help correct the garbage thats going on in the voting systems? So I tried to get hired by a voting system company. They wont touch me. I wonder why.
Greetings.

Right.

Right.
